settings.prefix: declare @SmoActiveDirectory sysname declare @RegPath nvarchar(1024) select @RegPath = N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\SQLServerSCP\' + db_name() exec master.dbo.xp_instance_regread N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', @RegPath, N'objectGUID', @SmoActiveDirectory OUTPUT

properties.property: CASE WHEN (@SmoActiveDirectory IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
